analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol:
	Contract WTXTToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol#227)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.22 (/unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol#2-3): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of WTXTToken.distributeToken (/unique_chucks/7/0x6bdf5c34253417f1d1210a22e099a7a71f97efe0.sol#249-250) is not in mixedCase
